comment: OK Folks, Jewish people were just killed at a synagogue. All bets are off. There is going to be a huge push for censorship of "hate speech" now. It's time to stand your ground. Refuse to be silenced. Just because a crazy man committed a terrible act doesn't mean that YOU committed a terrible act. Don't allow them to group you in with him. Speak forever free.
amr:
# ::snt OK Folks, Jewish people were just killed at a synagogue. All bets are off. There is going to be a huge push for censorship of "hate speech" now. It's time to stand your ground. Refuse to be silenced. Just because a crazy man committed a terrible act doesn't mean that YOU committed a terrible act. Don't allow them to group you in with him. Speak forever free.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / kill-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :mod (r / religious-group
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :location (s / synagogue)
            :mod (j / just)
            :ARG1-of (o / okay-01))
      :snt2 (o2 / off
            :domain (b / bet-01
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :snt3 (p2 / push-02
            :ARG1 (c / censor-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / speak-01
                        :ARG1-of (h / hate-01)))
            :mod (h2 / huge)
            :time (n2 / now))
      :snt4 (t / time
            :mod (s3 / stand-11
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (g / ground
                        :poss y)))
      :snt5 (m2 / mean-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c2 / commit-02
                  :ARG0 (m3 / man
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / crazy-03))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / act-02
                        :ARG0 m3
                        :ARG1-of (t2 / terrible-01)))
            :ARG2 (c4 / commit-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (a3 / act-02
                        :ARG0 m3
                        :ARG1-of (t3 / terrible-01))))
      :snt6 (a4 / allow-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (g2 / group-01
                  :ARG0 (t4 / they)
                  :ARG1 y3
                  :prep-with m3)
            :time (f / forever)
            :ARG1-of (f2 / free-04)))

comment: In all fairness calling anyone "retarded" as a slur is pretty much admitting you haven't evolved socially since 1992.
amr:

      :ARG1 (e / evolve-01

            :ARG1 y
            :manner (s / social)
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (d / date-entity
                        :year 1992)))
      :mod (p / pretty-much)

            :ARG1 (a2 / anyone)

      :mod (f / fairness
